text: Heart of Darkness is a book of fiction by Joseph Conrad. It is about a European sailor who travels to a Belgian colony in Africa. The story focuses on imperialism and colonialism. Conrad published it in a magazine in 1899, and as a book in 1902. The movie Apocalypse Now is based on this book. Category:1902 books Category:British novellas Category:Works by Joseph Conrad Category:Colonialism Category:Imperialism
title: Heart of Darkness
